website_summaries.verdict: This blender's performance and features make it a good deal.
pros: Compact design and easy operation makes this 600-watt blender beginner-friendly
Powerful enough to blend nuts and other whole foods
One of the more affordable options by the brand
cons: Some owners report the blades can be a bit tricky to wash, as food often gets stuck beneath them

website_summaries.verdict: An attractively priced option with a relatively powerful motor.
pros: Optimized to extract nutrients from food

website_summaries.verdict: The most popular personal-sized blender for a reason. Its quality and performance is unmatched for a blender in this price range.
pros: Small and compact, yet will pulverize just about anything you throw at it
12-piece set makes it highly customizable for a variety of use cases

customer_reviews.title: Cup sheds plastic
customer_reviews.text: I put just one small ice cube in with other fruits and vegetables and the cup was completely torn apart. I noticed after drinking the smoothie and tasting bits of plastic. This happened after just three uses of the blender, so the cup was still brand new. Very weak quality and false advertising of the product's capability.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good power but..
customer_reviews.text: Twice now I have taken the base off to push chunks of fruit down and the rubber seal has come off. That means I have to clean the blades and dry them and the seal and put it back together before I can finish my smoothie. I didn't think to take a picture but the next time it happens I will. Not particularly happy about this,
customer_reviews.author: Faerynuff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blender
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Easy to clean and use. A bit of noise, but it's a blender, what can you do. Very efficient, even with ice, as long as you don't overfill it. I would recommend to anyone. I have a vitamix as well and find myself using this more because it's smaller and easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent small blender for smoothies or other personal blended drinks. We use ours daily. Other versions have additional containers and accessories, which in my opinion are not worth the addition cost. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr ATC

customer_reviews.title: Nice....
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It works very well. It handles ice and frozen fruit if they're not in huge chunks. Yes, it's loud... will scare you the 1st time. But it's wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: penname

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Design - It leaks and sprays everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Very poor design. It leaks and sprays everywhere. For some bizarre reason, it forces one to flip the blender case upside down. The blender cup is made of very cheap plastic. One can easily crack and crush it just by squeezing one's hands. In order for it not to leak (and spray, in my case protein shake, everywhere) one needs to try to screw it tightly but screwing it too tightly will crack the cheap plastic. In order for this thing to get so many positive reviews, there must be a lot of shill reviews. It is a terrible design and cheaply made. You will spend far more time cleaning up after it than blending.
customer_reviews.author: Nik Bear Brown

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: I am livid! I was so excited for this to come to aid me in my new healthy lifestyle. The product came very quickly. It almost seemed too good to be true and it was. It came in yesterday evening and i decided to use it today and there are soap stains in the cup and brown crust on the blade so it is clearly used. I am so disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: BRAVO NUTRIBULLET!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wanted a Nutribullet for years, and finally got one!! I’ve only used it twice, but it exceeded my expectations in every way!! It comes with a cool quick start instruction page that allows you to use it right away! And it’s not just good for smoothies! It also makes sauces, chops nuts, and grinds granular sugar into powdered sugar. Yes, simple tasks, but I’m just thrilled with it, and it was exactly what I wanted and needed!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff & Laura

customer_reviews.title: Bad box, used product
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived in horrible condition. The product itself is all scuffed up, it is clearly a used product. Super disappointed in this purchase
customer_reviews.author: mbgtc67

customer_reviews.title: Blends OK, gasket constantly falls out
customer_reviews.text: We got this thing to replace another cheap bullet style blender. I'd say it works fine and can hold a bit more than the other one we had. I primarily blend frozen fruit with some juice or milk, and it comes out mostly smooth, but there are frequently some small chunks that just won't blend. The biggest annoyance is that whenever blending frozen fruit, the gasket comes out from around the blade EVERY SINGLE TIME. It's quite the design flaw I'd say. The frozen fruit makes it cold and causes a suction which makes the gasket fall out, but it's not very easy to get back in its groove. I'd hope this is something they can fix in the future.
customer_reviews.author: M. M.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: broke on the first try. I would not recommend this product. Waste of time money and resources.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Halls

customer_reviews.title: So Far SO SO GOOD😁
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Nutribullet today. I used it once, and so far So So Good. It blended my smoothie that consisted of Spinach, Banana,Pineapple, A Celery Stick & Frozen Raspberries With 1 cup of Water, like a dream. It was SO Smooth , I only had to blend my smoothie for about 40 seconds and It was perfect. I can't wait to make more smoothies now. I'll continue to update this post on its functionality after time etc. Also , SO EASY TO CLEAN. I'm so glad I went with the NutriBullet VS The Magic Bullet.
customer_reviews.author: Raych

customer_reviews.title: Favorite purchased item ♥️
customer_reviews.text: I’m one to never leave a review on anything. But I must say I love everything about this blender I mainly bought it cause I wanted something that can crush ice for my smoothies and it works perfect. Not just that when I clean it it’s the easiest thing to do. It’s also a nice size to put away not bulky at all. I’m so happy with my purchase and would absolutely buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Jd

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than 90 days???
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this nutri bullet on February 15 2020 It stopped working today May 3rd 2020 Apparently one of the 3 white actuators lost the spring tension or the contacts under it don’t work Anyway seems to be a defect Have not had it even 90 Days? Any possibility for an exchange? Send this one back to the Lab or QC folks to see what happened? Last one I had lasted about 8 years? Appreciate your consideration on an exchange Thanks Tom
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: It's a very good mixer. It's fast and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good mixer. It's fast and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Li Juan

customer_reviews.title: A consumer's advice -
customer_reviews.text: Be cautious of the fact that this specific product is compatible with 110 voltage network. If you are at a 220 voltage country (my case), you will get to experience a beautiful show of sparks, flames and smoke through your kitchen. There is no transformer, nor a proper caution - be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Great little blender. It makes one large smoothie, or I split it up for me and my daughter to share and it's plenty. We used to have the magic bullet, and that was great for about a year until it burned out. I wanted one a little bigger to make more quantity, and this does the trick. Size wise it between the magic bullet and a conventional blender. Works with frozen fruit. I haven't tried it with ice yet, but the instructions say to add ice if you want, so I assume it's good to go.
customer_reviews.author: LouAnn Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Had reservations but so far so GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was put off for a little while from reviews, it had so many great reviews but you can't help but read the bad ones. I finally made the dive and bought it and honestly it's been great. I needed it to do 2 things for me, blend and be easy to clean. It does both. It's just about as loud as any other blender but the clean up is as easy as unscrewing the blades and rinsing them off. Everything that I put in my blender blended well so no complaints. Oh and no leaks. After I unscrew the unit off it is dry. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Sereyvisale Pheng

customer_reviews.title: Motor burning out
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this just this past March and really liked it until not long ago when it started emitting a burning smell while blending. It also imparted a burnt taste in my smoothies. Contacted Nutribullet customer service since this is still under warranty and explained in my email what it was doing. CS said it sounded like I need a new blade? Which they would be happy to send me for $4.99 shipping. The burning smell I think would be the motor going bad.Thanks but no thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, but doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I love my bullet. only thing with this product is I have to replace it nearly every year. For some reason it doesn't stop me from buying it though because I do love it so much. I just know after a year or so, I'll need to buy again. I do use it every day however.
customer_reviews.author: colouch

customer_reviews.title: perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I have used a very cheap blender for a long time. I make a smoothie every morning for breakfast. That much use killed my little cheap one. This one is awesome. It's quieter (not quiet but quieter) and powerful enough to blend my frozen fruit, almond milk and greek yogurt to a totally smooth drink. Hopefully it'll last.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer does not deal well with issues
customer_reviews.text: The Nutribullet gasket kept coming away and landing in my drink a little over a month after purchase, the manufacturer agreed to send the new part after a long time on phone but would charge shipping, I agreed to that although I was not happy since it is clearly a fault with the product. Then while supposedly setting it up they dropped the call,. Since Amazon had initiated the call, I did not have a number to call back or another hour to waste. My advise- do not buy this product via Amazon buy it somewhere you know it can be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Annoyed
customer_reviews.text: This is my second nurti bullet. My last one lasted over a year with daily use. It still worked but sounded extremely tired. I thought time for a new one and use that as a back up. Every time I make a shake in this the base gets stuck inside and I have had to sit and try and pry the cup out for 20 minutes every morning. Annoyed that I had so much faith in this product I threw out the box and everything. I have a feeling I was sold a refurbished product.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon W

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased May 30 stopped working July 23! I am very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Shelia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm so please with this product. I use it every morning when I make my breakfast smoothies. Easy to use and clean. Reasonably priced. I arise very early so it's a bit noisy but that's because the house is super quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Great - Needs Assemble Instructions
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t come with assemble directions. While it may seem simple, it isn’t if you know nothing about the blender. Once I did figure it out, I was surprised that there was no on/off button. The YouTube videos I used to help me assemble all had blenders with a light and an on/off button. Once I did figure it out, I was and am pleased with the blending except that some ice cube chunks are left in.
customer_reviews.author: Buffy Hong

customer_reviews.title: My new Go-To for breakfast
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING. I put spinach, peaches (with skin), berries, bananas, yogurt, ice, protein powder, water and it makes an fabulous smoothie in an instant. I did purchase the 32 oz cup separately which gives me the quantity I like. These blades are no joke and easily run through the dishwasher. I use this EVERY morning - it has become my new go-to. I cannot say enough great things about the product. I purchased a 2nd set of blades so I can have a clean one ready while the other is in the dishwasher. I’m addicted and you will be too.
customer_reviews.author: My 2 Cents

customer_reviews.title: It's much better than a regular blender
customer_reviews.text: This WILL make your smoothies quite smooth, BUT you have to blend for close to a minute to get kale and such really blended. I like to chew a little, so it if just what I need. Cleaning, though is a different matter. I make smoothies for 4 people, and the 3rd I have to clean from the area where the blade and the base meet. Somehow I get smoothie drops there. If I don't clean them, they get closer and closer to spill into the motor. The containers, just rinse out well and place in upper part of dishwasher, and all is well
customer_reviews.author: Nowwhat

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 month.
customer_reviews.text: Will not buy this brand again. Total waste of money. I can't return it and no customer service to help how to deal with this problem. It is just stop working. I'm kindly ask Amazon to return my money. But no answer so far.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Product changed
customer_reviews.text: I have used the NutriBullet for my smoothies for several years. This makes the third one I have purchased. I use it daily. but they don't last as long as I feel they should. Now they have changed the size of the vessel making it smaller. Therefore I have had to change the amounts of each item I place in the vessel. I doubt I will purchase another NutriBullet. I will look for something of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shasta Vanetti

customer_reviews.title: THIS THING SHOULDN'T BE SOLD ANYMORE
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked this product is still being sold! I was trying to make a smoothie this morning and it just exploded on me. The contents were scalding hot and now I am left with burns on my wrist. Thank god it wasn't close to my face and eyes!! I searched 'nutribullets explode' and came across an article on CBS that states nutribullet has a lawsuit filed against it because of several incidents like this. PLEASE RECALL THIS before more people get hurt!
customer_reviews.author: Esha

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of money, don't even blend for a minute before going off, you have to wait for about 5 to 10 minutes before you can blend again, making 1 smoothie took me about half an hour. After a single use I returned this item, few days later they sent it back to me according them they can't accept my return because it didn't meet there return criteria.
customer_reviews.author: Amadu Bah

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.text: After my third time using it the blender broke on me. And to make things worse I can't return it because they claim it's part the return date and I have to deal with the manufacturer for a replacement. What a waste. You'll be better off buying one at your local store, at least they would replace it if there's a problem.
customer_reviews.author: LaShonda

customer_reviews.title: Defective Seal
customer_reviews.text: The rubber washer seal falls out and gets blended up. The seal is in the blade cap and is supposed to prevent leaking. However, it started falling out during blending and he company sent me another ($10 shipping charge). The replacement also did the same thing, so I returned the entire unit. My old Bullet never did that, so I assume the company changed something in the design making this model defective. See pic.
customer_reviews.author: mohica

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, healthy smoothies with just a little effort to keep clean.
customer_reviews.text: We use it every day for fruit/veggie/nut smoothies. Blades are a little tricky to wash because one part rides so low against the base. And the ring seal needs to be cleaned thoroughly. Trick is to wash immediately after using with hot soapy water. Don’t let food dry before washing. Practical, easy, ensures we eat healthy every day.
customer_reviews.author: Arlie F Sims

customer_reviews.title: Smell like burnt rubber
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this NutriBullet 6 months ago and it has since stop blending mid blend and smell like burnt rubber smoking. The first time I purchased a NutriBullet it lasted a good deal of time but I purchased that from Walmart. A blender that blends so well and you follow the instructions on how to use the product shouldn't go out mid blend nor should it smell like burnt rubber. Do not purchase this blender from Amazon and if you do always get a warrant otherwise you'll end up here 6 months later complaining and looking for a new blender that will last you a decent amount of time for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Creativetomakeup

customer_reviews.title: Better than a blender
customer_reviews.text: Ice, one can of kern's juice, and some rum, is probably not the nutri that this bullet was intended for but that is my favorite this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Very good value! Highly recommended for shakes, smoothies and sauces! I love it 🥰
customer_reviews.text: I have being using it for almost a year now , and I am very surprised of the duration and quality of this affordable product! I make tahinis and marinada with it, it’s knife extremely strong, can be in the dishwasher, and it works the same as when I first bought it! And it’s powerful blend will make smoothies even with bigger size ice cubes... I definitely recommend! The price for the value is better then many other major brands out there, and it looks beautiful too!
customer_reviews.author: Miri Hatouel

customer_reviews.title: 1 worked great, 1 nearly caught fire
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 of these. The first one lasted about a year. The latest one I used 3 times before it began blowing smoke out of the back of it. It smelled like melted plastic and I had to throw it outside. I like the units enough that I'm going to try a third one. When they work, they work great! I made thousands of smoothies with my first one.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Smoke coming out from the motor when almost new.
customer_reviews.text: I used it approximately ten times, for 1-2 minutes each time. Last time I used it, I made smoothies for 4 people and I ended up using it for a total of 5-6 minutes (not straight). It broke miserably with smoke coming out from the motor. Unless you plan to use it for a very short time (1 minute approx every time) buy a more powerful blender.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Polverino

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying. Broke second week.
customer_reviews.text: It broke the second week I had it. The glass broke and the plastic inside of it came out when I was cleaning it. Not worth buying it because it’s too expensive just for 2 weeks. I’m happy with other brands like breville.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality, mine stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Mine stopped working for the second use.. I am going to return it. I used fenugreek seeds to grind after soaking them for 2 days. It stopped working while I was grinding.
customer_reviews.author: Kee

customer_reviews.title: Brown residue problem within 3 months
customer_reviews.text: 3 months in and brown liquid seeping through on the blade side. Very disappointed. I wish I had read the customers questions asking the same question. Totally useless now. Will check with the company if they would replace and provide an update here
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Great blender for frozen fruits and veg
customer_reviews.text: Very loud but its a blender. What did you expect? Blends easily and very easy to clean. Makes getting a few servings of fruit and veggies in my diet a lot easier. The rubber band at the bottom of the blade piece keeps slipping off but at leastt it east to slip back on.
customer_reviews.author: AliceS

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love nutribullet over other blenders, works very well, & more compact. Happy it didn’t come with all the clutter like they used to, just one blade and one cup. My other one lasted me years, but was time for new. Happy they are still good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous product!!!
customer_reviews.text: On my very first time using this product it immediately started smoking and sparks came out of the main body of the nutribullet, I turned it off before it could catch fire. It is the most disappointing thing I have ever bought and it is too dangerous to use!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Look no more. Really buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: I am not exaggerating if I said it is a dream came true. Been in fitness and healthy for 15 years and I hate cooking and hate making my smoothies because of the mess, time and cleaning. This machine is the most convenient tool I ever had for my food preparation. 3 minutes in the kitchen my smoothie is ready with my supplements blended in it + 30 seconds cleaning. And I can even take it to go 😀😀. 100% recommended. And For just $50!!
customer_reviews.author: iRSE Seller

customer_reviews.title: Short life
customer_reviews.text: This product was perfect for my office, but I only was able to use a handful of times and it just quit working. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jade S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender !!️
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for over a Month now and I’ve been using it ever since with no problem,It blends my smoothies nice and smooth jus how I like it with No (Chunks) I seen a lot of ppl complaining about the mess it leaves at the bottom somtime,Jus an heads up it has a Max line on the container jus don’t pass that line and you’ll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: DaJohn

customer_reviews.title: Love this bullet
customer_reviews.text: The bullet is awesome for ice and frozen fruit. It has far outlasted all the other blenders I have used. It is so easy. I have purchased this for multiple people as gifts and it is Never a let down! It's wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great machine!
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day. This is my second one. I have ordered replacement parts that I have not been happy with, it may be a knock off part and not actually from Nutri bullet. All said, I love this machine and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Where does this ring go?
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this yet because even after reading the manual and watching the video I have not been able to figure out where this plastic screw on piece goes or what it is for? The machine is bigger than I anticipated but that's my fault - I did not pay close enough attention to the dimensions that are listed in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace one that I wore out (it still worked, but got noisy and sometimes smelled a little hot). I use this everyday to make my morning green smoothie. This new one is so much quieter and smoother operating. Love it! Nice that it didn't come with so many pieces -- as I have multiple cups and lids. The price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Kathie A.

customer_reviews.title: A hassle to clean the base: mold, decaying food
customer_reviews.text: This product blends very well. That being said, it is a hassle to clean the base of the blade. There is a removable ring that sits in the base that is both difficult to install and remove. You have to remove it and clean if you don’t want to ingest mold, decaying food. It took a couple weeks of using to realize this little ring was there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Used this product exactly 3 times before the rubber gasket fell off. A quick google search will tell you that this is a ubiquitous defect and renders the product absolutely useless. The gasket cannot be put back into place nor can you buy a new one. You must purchase a new blade each time this happens for $25. Ignore any positive reviews and look elsewhere for a blender.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Jar leaks brown rusty liquid.
customer_reviews.text: The jar leaks a brown rusty liquid with fine metal particles. Something seems to be grinding under the blade and discharging this fluid at the base side that sits in the rotor. I am afraid it’ll start leaking on the inside of jar soon. I searched about this issue and it seems to be a common problem with lot of Nutri bullet users. I will not recommend anyone to buy this item.
customer_reviews.author: Adinath Narasgond

customer_reviews.title: Love my Nutribullet!
customer_reviews.text: I love Nutribullet. It’s an easy way for me to make healthy smoothies to boost my immune system in such a difficult time. I make them for the family, and it takes less then a minute to do. Don’t fill any liquid above the max fill line, and never blend for longer than a minute at a time and you’ll enjoy this product. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Did I receive a USED ITEM?
customer_reviews.text: I’m concerned that this is a used/refurbished blender. There is a label over the original serial number for the warranty registration. The serial number on the actual product is different. I did NOT want a used item. And there was no disclaimer before purchase. I’ll further investigate this tomorrow and update this review if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs work
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to make smoothies in the morning and figured this would work perfect. Started getting a burning smell from mirror within first week of using. My motor seems to have almost given out now. Smokes when using for about 10-15 seconds and completely loses HP. Guess I gotta go with a stronger one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Small & Durable
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a couple weeks and so far no issues. Purchased this after I decided to start Daily Harvest to avoid all my unhealthy snacking and grazing. The smoothies come frozen. I add a little water and pop the frozen fruits then this little guy does the job no problem. Overall no complaints so far
customer_reviews.author: jicole24

customer_reviews.title: It's not as good as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: The previous machine I had was a magic bullet which functioned way better than the nutribullet. This one only comes with one blending cup and the rubber grip by the blades keep coming off. The blender is really loud and it gets stuck most of the time & difficult to open once it's finished blending. The only good thing about this, is the consistency of the blended food is great.
customer_reviews.author: varda

customer_reviews.title: Gasket falls out of two units.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned multi units over the years and recently lost mine during a move. I purchased a new one and after the first use the gasket came off. I contacted Amazon and they promptly sent a replacement. The same thing happened with the replacement. To Amazon's credit they have handled things well. However the maker of this product should be ashamed they have not addressed this problem. I will not be purchasing a product made by them again.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Rowell

customer_reviews.title: Packing issue
customer_reviews.text: This is for a birthday gift--not one listed in the listing form but still I am disappointed that it came in the original box looking rather beat up. Had my son been home the surprise would be ruined. His birthday isn't until the 29th so am not going to open till then and I hope it's not damaged inside.
customer_reviews.author: Cabincreek

customer_reviews.title: Equipment failed, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This unit broke, motor burned out and cannot return now because I have had it for a few months. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne L Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in early March 2020. I used it to make protein shake mixes. The only ingredients I would put into it were milk, bananas, whey powder, creatine, and ice. It’s now September 2020 this product smokes every time I try to use it. It smells like burnt plastic and I would never buy this product again. I wish I could return this, but it doesn’t allow me to since it’s been more than 30 days. I’ve never been this disappointed in a product on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Canar

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product.. blends everything quite nicely.. 4 stars is because my motor went out 8n my last 1 so had to purchase another.. use it only long enough to blend your smoothie dont let it get hot.. I guess that was my mistake I blended my sugar gliders vitamins for a minute because directions on their vitamins says 3 minutes..and then it died so got another.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade from the Magic Bullet
customer_reviews.text: We finally wore down our Magic bullet which we've had for years. It served us well. When it came time to buy a new one, we decided on the Nutribullet. Better price here than at Target, actually. It's everything you expect it to be. Does the job very well. More powerful. Love it. RIP to our Magic bullet.
customer_reviews.author: tennisman

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen mixed reviews but honestly I’m really happy with the quality of the blender. I found that if you put too much frozen fruit it doesn’t blend as fast which is normal. If you have the right balance of liquid to fruit ratio it blends super quick. Really easy to clean and doesn’t make a mess. I’m happy with my purchase. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Motor Burn Out
customer_reviews.text: This product has only been used once daily by myself only and burned out in less than 10 weeks. I notice a smell coming from the unit and I immediately stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. McDaniel III

customer_reviews.title: I am pleasantly surprised in the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes. Tons of likes. Solid well built machine. We use it for smoothies, cooking, crushed ice, and more. It outperforms our traditional blender too. (They are close, this one seems smoother and less clumps.) We like it so much so we put away our old blender and this guy took its spot.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Dying after 6mo
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this daily and as the instructions have suggested for 6mo now and the motor is already burning out. It runs very loud and there is a rusty liquid coming out of the bottom part of the blade piece. Whatever I blend smells and tastes like the burning motor.
customer_reviews.author: Corrie H

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I had a Nutribullet a few years ago and she died. Finally decided to replace her and it reminded me how much I enjoyed her. I was making smoothies in my full size blender and it was becoming a chore. With my Nutribullet I just blend, remove from base and place lid and go. Very powerful and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn't give this a 5 is b/c the lid attachment so you can use the blender cup as a cup - the spout is too small - if the hole was a little bit bigger it would be perfect. I don't want to have to use a straw either. Otherwise - zero complaints :)
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Adams

customer_reviews.text: I love these for a grab and go breakfast smoothie in the morning. It is big so you will be full for a while. I don’t like is blending. I feel like the good could defiantly be better blended but all in all it is nice to have for a quick smoothie. All in all it is a good quality for the price:
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: How can I return this product? I purchased it in February 2020, as of June 2020 and only using a handful of times. It simply doesn't work. How can something stop working after using less than 12 times and in less than 4 months. JUNK. I'd like my money back please.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Pletz

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I had my other Neutra bullet for about two years and the blade broke. This one works just as good if not better. Would have probably given five stars but the rubber portion came out of the cup to help seal it. No big deal it still works good.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Elle

customer_reviews.title: Best blender ever
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! I live in a small NYC apartment and do not have counter space but this fit perfectly and o absolutely love the way this blends and how I can switch the top and take the cup to go! Best buy ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jayna

customer_reviews.title: It does not work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product May 5 for my son. He has used maybe 10 times as of June 6 2020 and it literally froze. He was blue day smoothie and he said it was doing ok and then he heard a loud ping noise and it just froze the cup was jammed and the blade would not come off the cup. I really thought this product was worth it but it’s not. Now i need to scramble to find him a new one. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Wynkoop

customer_reviews.title: Awesome durable smoothie blender
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this almost daily for over a month now to make protein shakes and smoothies. I absolutely love this thing. It is powerful, very simple to use, and easy to clean. It can sometimes get a little bogged down when i put in too much ice or frozen fruit and the smoothie turns more into an ice cream consistency, but it still keeps blending.
customer_reviews.author: Will S

customer_reviews.title: Durable and well made product, but it will wear out at some point... duh
customer_reviews.text: Bought another for my daughter. She loves it. The first one we bought worked great for years, however recently fluid is starting to leak into the cap. It’s hard to describe, but it appears the seal surrounding the blades is leaking into the cap. The noise has gotten louder since this started happening. Again, I’ve had this for a very long time. We got good use out of it. It was worth it, that’s why I bought a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander A Celis

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long to get this?
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I fight over this little guy, LOL. Fruit Smoothies, Green Smoothies, Sauces, Dips, whatever. We use it all the time. We'll be getting "replacement" cups so we don't fight over the one cup that came with it anymore, LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Unit burnt out after just 3 months
customer_reviews.text: pretty disappointed in the durability of this unit. lasted only 3 months with normal usage of 1x or 2x day.
customer_reviews.author: intheknow

customer_reviews.title: Missing cutter blade attachment!
customer_reviews.text: I've had one of these in the past but it eventually started leaking so I just purchased another one because thery're very handy device, This one was missing the cutter blade attachment!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Gasket problems
customer_reviews.text: I purchased and returned. Some reviews had excellent comments, but I just didn’t feel like it was reliable enough for everyday use. It definitely cannot handle frozen fruit so that was my main concern. Also the first time I used it the gasket came off so I figured that was a bad sign. However, it is easy to clean and fast if you are constantly on the go
customer_reviews.author: Macaela Hansford

customer_reviews.title: Great smoothie maker
customer_reviews.text: I was using a large Ninja blender for my smoothies and it worked fine, but I chose to buy the Nutribullet and am so glad that I did. The clean up is much simpler and the blend time is shorter. This little guy has great power! The rubber seal ring around the blade does come off sometimes so just be aware of that but it is not a deal breaker at all. The cup that comes with it is large enough to accommodate the big smoothies I make for breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prefer over Ninja900w
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Nutribullet to replace a Ninja 900w. I find it easier to use (the Ninja has only a pulse setting); and is much quieter than the Ninja. 600w seems to be plenty of power for smoothies. I previously owned the smaller Magic Bullet and overall, prefer this line of products over the Ninja.
customer_reviews.author: Ciebie

customer_reviews.title: keep away from
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my parents but it only lasted them about 1 week before they started to have difficulties with it. Apparently it smelled like burnt. Also could not use repeatedly after each use. Would not work right after they made a smoothie. Had to cool down again.. just a bad product and when I wanted to return the window of time they give you had expired.. no good
customer_reviews.author: RAFAEL LOBAINA

customer_reviews.title: Simple, effective and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use and easy to clean. No issues with the blade getting stuck or putting off an over heating smell that is common with blenders. I made several items with this device including sauces, desserts, salsa, humus, peanut butter, smoothies, and protein shakes with absolutely no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BREAK THE PLASTIC SEATING NODULES PRIOR TO BLENDING PUSHING DOWN ON IT, DON'T TWIST
customer_reviews.text: WISH I HAD ONE BEFORE GETTING A TRADITIONAL FOOD PROCESSOR FOR MY NEEDS. ADDICTED TO WANTING TO GET UP TO A SMOOTHIE EVERY DAY, SUPER EXCELLENT FOR MASHING FOODS IF YOU HAV3 TEETH OR ORAL ISSUES CHEWING OR SWALLOWING.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for making almond milk
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and found it great for making almond milk, but it was very difficult to get the blade portion disassembled from the cup. If anyone has hints for making that easier, I would love to know. Otherwise, I'm extremely satisfied. Yes, it is loud, but that was not at all unexpected, and you only run it for one minute at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS FOR MY HUSBAND FOR HIM TO USE IT AT WORK FOR HIS SHAKES THROUGHOUT THE DAY. HE LOVES IT SO MUCH. ITS A GREAT PRODUCT NO COMPLICATIONS SO FAR. I WILL UPDATE MY REVIEW IF ANYTHING CHANGES WITHIN REASONABLE TIME
customer_reviews.author: Sancia

customer_reviews.title: Minor annoyances but otherwise great.
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful and perfect for smoothies and managing portion control! My only complaint with it is that there’s always a 1/2 inch at the top of the cup where ingredients don’t get blended when you turn it on. So I have to stop the blender at least twice to shake the cup and redistribute ingredients. Just annoying. Otherwise it’s a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Died after a week and a half
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son to take to his new apartment when he left for college. He's only been using it for a week and a half and uses it about once a day to make a smoothie. This morning he was making a smoothie and it just stopped and won't start again. It must have burned out and he's only been using it for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Gizzi

customer_reviews.title: Blender good until it isn’t.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 3 stars because we are on our 3rd one in 5 years. Most recently the plastic blender cups caused a problem with our blender and kept getting stuck and ruined the blender. If this happens again, this will be my last purchase and I will look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: DOLIMITE

customer_reviews.title: Great product, few accessories
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, but I really wish it came with at least 2 blending cups. Other products similar to this have a few more options. BUT it is powerful and works well. It almost might be a bit too big for just a morning smoothie!
customer_reviews.author: Molarwife

customer_reviews.title: Good Blender, but not unique from everything else on the market
customer_reviews.text: I don't have much to say about this product. It's just a blender. Our family uses it to blend frozen fruit and orange juice into smoothies, and it works well for that. As far as blenders go, it's pretty easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa N

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender
customer_reviews.text: But don't run when the top is wet or over 60 seconds. The motor will overheat.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Adams

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: The gasket popped out within 3 uses and after a month it started smoking
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: it did not last
customer_reviews.text: product stopped working in July did not last no place to write manufacturer or nothing looks like i am out 50+ for this product should have purchased it with someone else
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Carner

customer_reviews.title: Worst Blender
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't blend properly. Leaves chunk of ice and frozen fruit no matter how long I leave it on.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

product_meta.title: Nutribullet 600W Nutrient Extractor, 6pcs
product_meta.description: Meet the original NutriBullet, Our compact-yet-powerful personal blender. You choose what goes in to get the most out of every ingredient, every day. With NutriBullet, healthier living is super simple.
feature_bullets: The NutriBullet is the fastest, easiest solution for making nutrient- packed smoothies. Load it up with your favorite whole foods like nuts, berries and spinach, then push, twist and blend your way to a healthier lifestyle.
Powerful 600-watt motor and refined nutrient-extraction blades blend whole foods into liquid fuel for your body - in seconds.
(1) 600W motor base, (1) Extractor blade, (1) 24 oz cup, (1) to-go lid, (1) lip ring and recipe book
Powerful stainless steel Extractor blades use Cyclonic action to break down tough ingredients. High-performance, BPA-free plastic cups are long lasting and Durable
Hassle-free cleaning - simply twist off the blade, rinse with soap and water, and put the cups in the top rack of the dishwasher. This item comes with a 1 year Limited .
Note: Refer to user manual before use
Product built to North American & Canadian Electrical standards

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,944 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
